author: Amazon Customer

review: I wanted to see if I could figure out how to watch the shows I want to watch and not pay the cable company for all the channels I never watch (and the ones that are only there to sell me something!)  Bingo!  I love this option.  I have Netflix, HuluPlus, Amazon Prime, and a few other streaming options and can watch pretty much whatever I want to when I want to watch it.  I'll be ordering one of these devices for my other rooms with TVs and turning off cable permanently.  I can get all the local information I want & need online and everything else streams.  Excellent!
author: Robin J "howmuchwillitcost"

review: If you were like me, MTV music videos was a HUGE part of my childhood.  So, when you pair the ChromeCast with YouTube Playlist made up of music videos, it's PERFECT!  YouTube Playlist example below!!I have used this with Plex with mixed results as well.  I often have the videos buffer/stop randomly.  I'm assuming this is growing pains of the device.  Most of the issues look to be associated with audio with AC3 5.1.But, outside of Plex, perfect.  YouTube, Google Music, Netflix, Chrome Browser Casting.  All great!<-----VH1 - 100 Greatest Songs of the '90s----->[...]
